statements: SELECT * FROM TicketSales;
SELECT event_name, customer_name, purchase_date FROM TicketSales WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT ticket_id, event_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, seat_number, attendance_status FROM TicketSales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_price FROM TicketSales;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_id = 100
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, customer_name FROM TicketSales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT attendance_status, event_name, seat_number FROM TicketSales WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, event_name, purchase_date FROM TicketSales WHERE attendance_status = TRUE AND seat_number IN (1, 2, 3, 4)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_sold, AVG(ticket_price) AS average_ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT ticket_id, price, purchase_date FROM tickets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT ticket_id, seat_number, price, ticket_type, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE price > 50
SELECT ticket_id, seat_number, ticket_type FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE fan_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765' ORDER BY check_in_time ASC
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT purchase_date, price, seat_number FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-06-01' AND price < 100 ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, seat_number, price FROM tickets JOIN attendance_records ON tickets.ticket_id = attendance_records.record_id WHERE attendance_records.check_out_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM tickets;
SELECT DISTINCT purchase_date, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold FROM tickets GROUP BY purchase_date ORDER BY total_tickets_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, event_id, price FROM tickets WHERE seat_number = 10;
SELECT fan_name, event_id, attendance_date FROM fan_attendance WHERE seat_id = 5 ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT seat_id, stadium_id, seat_section FROM seating_arrangements WHERE seat_status = 'available';
SELECT ticket_id, seat_number, price FROM tickets WHERE event_id = 3 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT seat_number, price FROM tickets WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT event_id, COUNT(*) FROM fan_attendance GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets JOIN fan_attendance ON tickets.event_id = fan_attendance.event_id;
SELECT fan_name, event_id, seat_status FROM fan_attendance JOIN seating_arrangements ON fan_attendance.seat_id = seating_arrangements.seat_id;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, price FROM ticket_sales WHERE availability = TRUE
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT fan_name, attendance_status FROM fan_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE
SELECT seat_number, section, row_number FROM stadium_seating ORDER BY section, row_number
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_type, price FROM ticket_sales WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT fan_name, event_name, event_location FROM fan_attendance JOIN event ON fan_attendance.ticket_id = event.event_id;
SELECT * FROM stadium_seating WHERE row_number >= 10 AND section = 'VIP' ORDER BY seat_number ASC;
SELECT fan_name, ticket_type, price FROM fan_attendance JOIN ticket_sales ON fan_attendance.ticket_id = ticket_sales.ticket_id ORDER BY fan_name;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT ticket_id, event_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT event_name, attendance_date FROM attendance_records ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, stadium_section, seat_number FROM seating_arrangements WHERE seat_number BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, count(*) as total_tickets FROM attendance_records GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_tickets > 100 ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT event_name, seating_arrangements.stadium_section, seating_arrangements.seat_number FROM seating_arrangements INNER JOIN attendance_records ON seating_arrangements.ticket_id = attendance_records.ticket_id ORDER BY event_name ASC, seating_arrangements.stadium_section DESC;
SELECT section_name, capacity, stadium_id FROM stadium_sections WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY stadium_id, capacity DESC;
